name: Spiritus:One
description:
Return to classic survival horror in a unique new way. Albert and Rose investigate the mansion of 'Sanctuary', home to miscreants and broken souls, a vestige of horrors and dark secrets.

Presented in wonderful 3D HD graphics with awesome PSX style retro effects, Spiritus : One is the definite survival horror experience.

GAME FEATURES (EARLY ACCESS)
-Take arms and shoot zombies in this 3D top down survival horror.
-Precision aiming with mouse control
-Explore the Ash Manor with wonderfully desired details
-Explore the grounds of Ash Manor and explore caves, forests and a cabin in the woods
-Investigate the areas with story driven and realistic FMV sequences
-Variable (size based) Inventory system (Early Access note- not finished)

PRESENTATION
-A game presented in classic 3D survival horror with a unique top down perspective to fully immerse you in the world of Spiritus
-PSX Style rendering which takes players back to the best days of survival horror.

SOUNDTRACK
-Immersive sound effects and chilling soundtrack that immerses the player in the horror.
